title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Introducing our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, a must-have for your holiday decorations! This stunning set includes a 23.6-inch diameter wreath and an 8.8 feet long garland, adorned with snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, vibrant berry clusters, and frosted branches.

Experience the warm glow of 100 energy-efficient LED lights, perfect for creating a cozy and festive atmosphere both indoors and outdoors. The lights are battery-operated, requiring 3 AA batteries (not included), and feature a convenient timer function that turns on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours, saving you time and effort.

Our wreath and garland set is made from sturdy, high-quality materials that are not only hypoallergenic but also fireproof for your peace of mind. The set requires no assembly, making it easy to use straight out of the box.

The durability of this set is unmatched. It's strong, long-lasting, and maintenance-free. It never fades, ensuring that your decorations look as good as new year after year.

This versatile set is suitable for a variety of locations, including walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows.

We stand behind our product with a 365-day warranty and offer 24-hour customer service availability to ensure your satisfaction.

Don't miss out on this beautiful and practical addition to your holiday decor. Order now and bring the magic of Christmas into your home!
